content: --रुदितं (°ण्ये°) ‘weeping in a forest’, a cry in the wilderness; (<ab>fig.</ab>) a vain or useless speech, or a cry with no one to heed it, or any thing done to no purpose; अरण्ये मया रुदितं <ls>Ś. 2</ls>; प्रोक्तं श्रद्धाविहीनस्य अरण्यरुदितोपमं <ls>Pt. 1. 393</ls>; तदलमधुनारण्यरुदितैः <ls>Amaru. 76.</ls>
